columns.name: create_time
columns.description: Specifies the time, the factory was created.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for the data factory.

columns.name: additional_properties
columns.description: Unmatched properties from the message are deserialized this collection.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Managed service identity of the factory.

columns.name: encryption
columns.description: Properties to enable Customer Managed Key for the factory.

columns.name: repo_configuration
columns.description: Git repo information of the factory.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: List of private endpoint connections for data factory.
